content:
Basic Tenets

  • Simple to use

    • Implicit support for HTTP/1.1 clients
    • Easy to write versioning-aware clients

  • Based on WebDAV

    • Operations against the Web namespace
    • Integrates with WebDAV concepts and methods

  • Rich versioning

    • Resource-level operations
    • Configuration-level operations
